lead_paragraph: LISOWY--Donald, passed away on February 15, 2016. Director of Zoos and Aquarium Education at WCS. Father of Alex and John Lisowy and their mother Susan Riordan, partner of Annie McGinn, brother of Alice Mary Armstrong and Kathy Furnari. Visitation, 2-4 and 7-9pm, February 18, 2016 at Edward F. Carter Funeral Home, 41 Grand St., Croton-on-Hudson, NY. Mass, 10am, February 19th, Holy Name of Mary Church, Croton-on-Hudson, NY with burial to follow at Bethel Cemetery. 1/3
